attributes.action: Stop the use of Phorn or isp tracking within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is against the use of isp trackers being used to monitor what web sites people use in any form. Protecting this data being used agaist the consumer or it becoming public information

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
